articles.author: Keertan Ayamany
articles.title: EU recognises MySejahtera as equal to its Digital Covid Certificate - Malay Mail
articles.description: KUALA LUMPUR, April 4 — The European Union (EU) has accepted Malaysia’s request to recognise MySejahtera’s certification as being equal to EU’s Digital Covid Certificate, effective today. EU’s ambassador to Malaysia Michalis Rokas announced the matter in a Tw…
articles.content:
A woman holds up a phone displaying the MySejahtera app in Kuala Lumpur May 6, 2020. Bernama pic
KUALA LUMPUR, April 4 The European Union (EU) has accepted Malaysias request to recognise MySejahtera… [+1474 chars]

articles.author: Alex Druce
articles.title: Miners nudge ASX closer to record high - news.com.au
articles.description: The Australian sharemarket on Monday moved within 100 points of its all-time high as the miners once again enjoyed the benefits of a commodity cycle supercharged by conflict in Eastern Europe.
articles.content: The Australian sharemarket started the week on the front foot, with a host of mining names performing strongly.The Australian sharemarket on Monday moved within 100 points of its all-time high as the… [+4456 chars]
